text: [We must get to the bottom of this.] Consider your verdict.
[Let's begin then.] Call the first witness.
[How irresponsible!] You ought to have finished. When did you begin?
[This is getting nowhere.] Write that down. (to Hatter) Take off your hat.
[He's so nervous, I must threaten him to get the truth.] Give your evidence, and don't be nervous, or I'll have you executed on the spot.
[I must try to regain control of this situation.] Let the jury consider their verdict.
